rooms.description: A welcoming space that leads into the central courtyard.
Spacious area with views of the courtyard; includes seating and dining arrangements.
Modern kitchen with efficient layout; adjacent to a small pantry.
Basic facilities for guests, located near the entrance area.

openings.description: Double door leading into the entrance hall with Vastu-compliant positioning.
Glass doors connecting living areas to the courtyard for natural light and ventilation.
